scripts.install: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../api && npm install
scripts.dev: npm run dev:api & npm run dev:vite
scripts.dev:api: cd api && npx tsx --tsconfig tsconfig.json --watch src/backend.ts --seed
scripts.test:api: cd api && npx vitest --run && cd .. && npm run seed:mongo-local:small
scripts.seed:mongo-local:small: cd api && npx tsx --tsconfig tsconfig.json scripts/seedMongo.ts
